project.name: |-- hello-spring-boot-web
project.description:
This project is the simplest web application built upon Spring Boot. It includes the following classes: Application.java: The Configuration and Runner class. SampleController.java A simple Controller that returns a string to he browser when accessed /.
To run the application you must run the Application class or use spring-boot:run goal, and a Tomcat will be deployed to host the application.
